marklogic.body: Guilty much? I didnt even know if you was black or any other race and would've never known had you not made the comment "You people are so racist." I dont care what color you are I was trying to help your ungrateful a$$ out! You clearly stated that you only liked Justin Timberlake and maybe Drake since he's only half black. B*tch youre the racist one, obviously you have a problem with black men and dark people so I took it upon myself to redirect you to a Spot that will nurture your needs...now Off you go! BYE BYE
